column1: Table 4: Supply of Dentists in the U.S. by Practice, Research, or Administration Area, Dentists Working in Dentistry
column12: Table 4: Supply of Dentists in the U.S. by Practice, Research, or Administration Area, Dentists Working in Dentistry

column1: Source: American Dental Association, Health Policy Institute analysis of ADA masterfile.

Note: This table counts a single dentist toward each practice area for which they hold a degree. For example, a dentist possessing degrees in orthodontics and pediatric dentistry will be counted in both categories. Therefore, the sum of categories will exceed the number of dentists working in dentistry.
